title: Open Data Competency Development Project Through Data Journalism

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational data analysis concepts, basic smartphone proficiency, general awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: Project-based learning to solve community issues through game-based role-playing in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can independently search for and filter open data to solve community issues on public data portals.
Learners can transform collected data into graphical/textual formats to propose problem-solving solutions.
Learners can express critical perspectives on social issues through data-driven storytelling in role-play environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
